annotations.description: Thank you to Mr Black for sponsoring todays episode and for the great idea to make a Cold Brew Old Fashioned! To learn more about the Moccamaster and Bar Too...
annotations.title: Coffee Old Fashioned | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. - 30 ml. Mr Black
1 oz. - 30 ml. Reposado Tequila
.75 oz. - 22 ml. Amaro Angostura
2 Dashes Cocoa/Chocolate Bitters

Stir over ice and strain into a coupe
Garnish with orange peel

title: Chiapparoni
